short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dev Timer allows you to better manage your time and complete tasks quickly while also staying healthy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Built entirely with Material Design, Dev Timer helps introduce The Pomodoro TechniqueÂ® (http://pomodorotechnique.com) into your development flow.  

By breaking up tasks into smaller, more manageable chunks you can become more efficient and even stay healthier by getting up and moving around more often.
